thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 28 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Axogen Inc Q4 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.07

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Axogen Inc Q4 Adjusted Loss Per Share $0.07
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Axogen Inc:
* AXOGEN, INC. REPORTS 2017 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED LOSS PER SHARE $0.07 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 49 PERCENT TO $17 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE UP AT LEAST 40 PERCENT * ‍EXPECTS 2018 REVENUE WILL GROW AT LEAST 40% OVER 2017 REVENUE AND GROSS MARGINS WILL REMAIN ABOVE 80%​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.08, REVENUE VIEW $15.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $83.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
